about_the_game:
This resource pack contains 3D models of buildings, vehicles, small objects, plants, and other items inspired by Japanese landscapes such as local towns, bars, and train interiors.
Seven sample maps that include events and camera work for actual game use scenarios are also included.

［Smile Objects Vol.1］Contents

- Sample Maps -
Total: 7
Map 1: A small town in a rural area with a river flowing through it in the season of dancing cherry blossoms. Bus routes run amidst a shrine, a police station, a convenience store, and private homes, and a train visits the station. Visitors can also walk freely around the town.
Map 2: A bar has a calm atmosphere with gentle jazz music playing from the jukebox. A black-clad detective slowly sips his glass as if to relieve his fatigue.
Map 3: The scene of a murder that occurred in a dead corner of a city in the pouring rain. The map looks like the opening scene that begins the case.
Map 4: The detective walks from car to car on the train, which is arranged with seats facing each other.
Map 5: A village at night when a terrible incident took place. With the revolving lights of the police car flashing, the detective heads for the house where the crime scene took place.
Map 6: The detective breaks into the old house that is thought to be the scene of the crime. What did the detective see in the dark, intricate interior?
Map 7: Soak in the nice warm water and relieve fatigue while gazing at the starlit sky. It is a map of the covered open-air bath.

- 3D Stamps -
Total: 128
16 types of buildings, objects and structures attached to buildings, a bus, a train, a police car, plants such as cherry blossoms and bamboo, etc.

- Particles -
Total: 9 (5 types + 4 variations)

- Terrain -
Total: 1

- SE -
Total: 1

*The two 3D characters will be the same as the SMILE GAME BUILDER DLC "Smile Characters Vol. 1". In addition, new motions have been added to the motions included in "Smile Characters Vol. 1".

This resource pack contains 3D models of buildings, vehicles, small objects, plants, and other items inspired by Japanese landscapes such as local towns, bars, and train interiors.
Seven sample maps that include events and camera work for actual game use scenarios are also included.

Map 2: A bar has a calm atmosphere with gentle jazz music playing from the jukebox. A black-clad detective slowly sips his glass as if to relieve his fatigue.
Map 3: The scene of a murder that occurred in a dead corner of a city in the pouring rain. The map looks like the opening scene that begins the case.
Map 4: The detective walks from car to car on the train, which is arranged with seats facing each other.
Map 5: A village at night when a terrible incident took place. With the revolving lights of the police car flashing, the detective heads for the house where the crime scene took place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: This resource pack contains 3D models of buildings, vehicles, small objects, plants, and other items inspired by Japanese landscapes such as local towns, bars, and train interiors. Six sample maps that include events and camera work for actual game use scenarios are also included.
